==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = State Shift
|desc_1      = When hit by {{Electro}} or {{Pyro}} attacks, the Floating Anemo Fungus will enter an Activated or Scorched state respectively, gaining enhanced attacks. A Floating Anemo Fungus can only undergo state shift once.
* If the Floating Anemo Fungus is defeated while Activated or Scorched, it may drop {{Item|Inactivated Fungal Nucleus}}, {{Item|Dormant Fungal Nucleus}}, and {{Item|Robust Fungal Nucleus}}, while the drop rates for {{Item|Fungal Spores}}, {{Item|Luminescent Pollen}}, and {{Item|Crystalline Cyst Dust}} will greatly reduce.

|name_2      = Orb Shot
|desc_2      = Shoots an orb of Anemo energy at the player, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Anemo DMG}}.
* '''Activated:''' Shoots 3 orbs in a row.
* '''Scorched:''' DMG increased to '''100% ATK'''.
|file_2      = Floating Anemo Fungus Orb Shot
|caption_2   = Normal
|file_2_2    = Floating Anemo Fungus Orb Shot 2
|caption_2_2 = Activated
|file_2_3    = Floating Anemo Fungus Orb Shot 3
|caption_2_3 = Scorched

|name_3      = Bump
|desc_3      = Bumps into the player, dealing '''30% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
* '''Scorched:''' DMG increased to '''60% ATK''', knockback increased.
}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.<br>This mushroom may have a sizable cap, but the umbrella-shaped structure is in fact hollow, and thus does not make for a particularly good meal.|[[Archive]]}}
